p: DNA standards for cellular mRNA were prepared from purified PCR products of target genes. RT reaction was performed using total RNAs extracted from A549 cells infected with wild-type Cal [NS1_low-PAX_high]) and oligodT primer. Primers used for the PCR are (humanIL6-1F): ATGAACTCCTTCTCCACAAGCG, and (humanIL6-639R): CTACATTTGCCGAAGAG CCCTC, (humanIFNλ1-1F): ATGGCTGCAGCTTGGACCG, and (humanIFNλ1-603R): TC AGGTGGACTCAGGGTGG, (humanIFNβ-76F-NotI): ACTCGAGCGGCCGCCAATGAC CAACAAGTGTCTCCTCCAAA, and (humanIFNβ-753R-HindIII): AAACTTAAGCTTTT CTAGTGTCCTTTCATATGCAGTA.
